attributes.action: revise the monarch's address to Parliament from "my government" to "our government"
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is somewhat irritating that an elected government is referred to as the monarch's personal possession. The government is elected by the people and should be recognised as such. This simple change in the speech at the State Opening of Parliament would represent that it is the democratic will of the people that determines the governance of the UK.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
